Row.Text: +10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this City. City must have a Colosseum. [NEWLINE]Swedish replacement for the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Theater[ENDCOLOR].

25% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. City must have a Colosseum. [NEWLINE]Swedish replacement for the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Zoo[ENDCOLOR].
